views.markdown:
Version: 1.1.2 - Fix crash in iOS 5 Version: 1.1.1
- Optimization
Version: 1.1-6
- Fix issues with social extensions.
Version: 1.1-5
- Support iOS 8.4
Version: 1.1-4
- Fix not working bug in iOS 8.3

Version: 1.1-3
- Resolved key highlight animation.

Version: 1.1-2

Version: 1.1-1
- Work with @, # and . symbol.
Version: 1.0-12
- Fix issues with currency symbols.

Version: 1.0-11
- Fix issues with letters overlapping.
Note: You may need to delete /User/Library/Caches/com.keyboard if it still doesn't work.

Version: 1.0-10
- Better workaround for iOS <=6 key highlighting.

Version: 1.0-9
- Fix issues with Emoji and dark keyboard.

Version: 1.0-4
- Updated settings. (Now allow highlighting key when pressed, currently available in iOS 7+)
